ğŸ“‰ Maximum Pressure: Iran & Cuba
Trump is weighing military options for Iran and vowing to choke off oil and cash flow to Cuba. The aggressive stance is fueling global uncertainty and driving a flight to safety in gold.

âš ï¸ Trumpâ€™s 10% Cap on Credit Cards
Lenders are reeling after Trump called for a 10% ceiling on credit card interest rates. Analysts warn this could squeeze the $1.3 trillion U.S. consumer debt market and force banks to slash $27B in rewards programs.

ğŸ” STOCK SPOTLIGHT

Partnered to to let shoppers buy Walmart items via Google Gemini.

Adani & Reliance (Indian Conglomerates) +0.4%

Titans pledged $102 billion combined investment in AI and a massive renewable energy park.

A legal limit on the maximum interest rate a lender can charge on a loan.
